revised_title: Flight Mechanics and Muscle Function in Belostomatid Bugs
tldr: The authors studied the flight mechanics and muscle function of belostomatid bugs, focusing on the mesothorax where the fibrillar flight muscles are located. They described the location and innervation of the four pairs of fibrillar muscles and their roles in wing opening and flight. The study also provided preliminary observations on thoracic sensory receptors that are likely important for flight.
